name: unidriver

1.1.2.name: unidriver
1.1.2.description: Universal component drivers that can be reused in all test levels, from component to e2e.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && (tsc -p . || true) && npm run build-testsuite && npm run expose-adapters
scripts.build-testsuite: cp src/test-suite/index.ejs dist/test-suite/index.ejs && browserify dist/test-suite/app.js > dist/test-suite/bundle.js
